description.sun-moon:
The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a
physical move, the trap will explode and inflict
damage on the opposing Pokémon.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a
physical move, the trap will explode and inflict
damage on the opposing Pokémon.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a
physical move, the trap will explode and inflict
damage on the opposing Pokémon.
description.sword-shield:
The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a
physical move, the trap will explode and inflict
damage on opposing Pokémon.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If the user was not yet hit by an opponent's physical move this turn, this move will fail.
effect.shortEffect: Only inflicts damage if the user was hit by a physical move this turn.
